title: SQLDROP DATABASE Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLDROP DATABASE Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
DROP DATABASE
The
DROP DATABASE
command is used to 
delete an existing SQL database.
The following SQL drops a database named "testDB":
Example
DROP DATABASE testDB;
Note:
Be careful before dropping a database. Deleting 
a database will result in loss of complete information stored in the database!

Reference

❯
★
+1
